特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。
The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法: この科目は教室で対面で実施します。This course is conducted face-to-face in the class. For those who applied to take courses on-line, I will conduct real-time Zoom sessions during course hours.

トピック.授業計画1:
All sessions of both semesters will be conducted face to face in the class.
Spring semester:
1-2 Introducing the seminar and guidance on individual research.
3-10 Exploring globalization and development issues and research questions. Discussion among students and the instructor.
11-14 Guidance on writing research proposal for their graduation thesis.

Fall semester
1-5 Presentation of individual research by students.
6-12 Review, revise and finalize their research proposal.
13-14 Presentation of the final research proposal.
トピック.授業外学習2: Courses on Economics, Development, Globalization, and International Relations.
